user.title: User
user.description: Represents a user in the system, who can be a client or an expert.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

appointment.title: Appointment
appointment.description: Represents a scheduled appointment between a client and an expert.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the appointment was created.

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.description: Represents a chat conversation between users.

participants.description: An array of user IDs participating in the conversation.

lastMessage.description: The last message sent in the conversation.

lastMessageAt.description: The timestamp of the last message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the conversation was created.

message.title: Message
message.description: Represents a single message in a conversation.

senderId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

text.description: The text content of the message.

read.description: Whether the message has been read.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

serviceRequest.title: Service Request
serviceRequest.description: Represents a service request made by a client.

clientId.description: The ID of the client who made the request.

expertId.description: The ID of the expert assigned to the request.

status.description: The status of the service request.

description.description: A detailed description of the service needed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the request was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/appointments/{appointmentId}.description: Stores all appointments between clients and experts.

/conversations/{conversationId}.description: Stores metadata for each chat conversation.

/conversations/{conversationId}/messages.description: Stores all messages for a single conversation.

/serviceRequests/{serviceRequestId}.description: Stores all service requests from clients.
